command.name: add-module
command.title: Add a new module to the application
command.help:
This command adds a new module in the application. The module name is given as argument. Once generated, the module should be registered in the AWA application. It is configured by using an XML file which defines the beans, servlets, filters that it provides. The following files are created:
src/<project>-<module>.ads src/<project>-<module>-modules.ads src/<project>-<module>-modules.adb src/<project>-<module>-beans.ads src/<project>-<module>-beans.adb config/<module>.xml
